list.name: MALAISE
list.description: Byron's Super will also cause opponents to receive x% less healing from any source for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Byron's Super will also cause opponents to receive x% less healing from any source for x seconds.

list.name: INJECTION
list.description: Every x seconds the next basic attack will pierce through targets.
list.descriptionHtml: Every x seconds the next basic attack will pierce through targets.
